Name.description: A unique name of the configuration

GitRepositoryRoot.description: The git repository root for the targets if it exists

Name.description: A unique name of the target

Type.description: The type of target to run. This type must be known to the runtime or should be resolvable

Pack.description: The pack task description. This task packs a snapshot

Restore.description: The restore task description. This task restores a snapshot

Clean.description: The pack task description. This task cleans up after the others

ConnectionString.description: Used to hold a connection string for any target that needs it

Host.description: Used to hold a host url for any target that needs it

ContainerId.description: The name or the sha id of the docker container if a target is running in the container

IsRunningInDocker.description: If the target is running in a docker container

NameParts.description: Parts used to construct a unique name for the artifacts produced by the packing

items.description: Single part. Currently known parts are [ConnectionString, Host, ContainerId, GitRepositoryRoot]. These will be resolved to their values. Other parts will be copied as defined.
